p: Constitutional analysis of the composition of medicinal constituents of genus artemisia stated that a notable alteration in the concentration of chemical constituents is due to seasonal and atmospheric adjustments (Costa et al. 2009; Padalia et al. 2014). The genus artemisia possesses numerous therapeutic components, some important medicinally active constituents of this genus are mentioned in following Table 1 (Rashmi et al. 2014; Stappen et al. 2014; Sonker et al. 2015; Farahani et al. 2017; Hussain et al. 2017).
